name: Snake 99
description:
Snake 99 is a local multiplayer version of the classic Snake game. It supports as many players as your WiFi network can handle. Players connect to the WiFi network with their phones which act as controllers.

How to Start:
  • Start snake-99.exe on your computer
  • Make sure all players' phones are connected to the same WiFi network as the computer that's running snake-99.exe
  • Open your phone's browser and go to happyfuntimes.net or to the address displayed on the computer screen

Note: This game requires a computer with a WiFi connection and players require an Android or iOS device with a browser (Chrome preferred)

How to Play:
  • The gameplay is similar to classic Snake but with a few twists thrown in
  • You can either play in Domination mode (longest snake wins) or Deathmatch mode (most kills wins)
  • Eat fruits to get longer
  • Eat powerups for special powers:
    • Lightning bolt - speed up
    • Star - invincibility
    • Blue gem - grow 2 bars
    • Red gem - grow 3 bars
    • Diamond gem - grow 5 bars
    • King cobra - eat other snakes and grow to their size
    • Down arrow - slow down
    • Ice block - freeze
  • You will die if you run into yourself or you run into another snake
  • If you die, you will respawn in 2 seconds
Controllers:
  • Your phone is the controller
  • You can switch between 3 different control methods by tapping on the controller icon at the top of the screen: DPad, Joystick and Swipe

Thanks to Clint Bellanger for his sprites.

Built using Phaser.io and HappyFunTimes.
